scripts.precommit: ! git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD | grep -q master || lint-staged
scripts.commitmsg: ! git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD | grep -q master || validate-commit-msg
scripts.test: mocha -c -R progress -t 6000 -r babel-core/register -r babel-polyfill -r test/helpers.js test/**/*.spec.js
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run compile && npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.prerelease: npm run test && npm run test-e2e
scripts.release: npm run build && lerna publish --conventional-commits -m "chore(release): Bumped to version %s."
scripts.setup: npm run clean-mods && make setup && npm run compile
